Title: Walden ; And, Resistance to Civil Government.
Subtitle: Authoritative Texts, Thoreau's Journal, Reviews, and Essays in Criticism.
Authors: Henry David Thoreau.
Categories: Literary Collections.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=uVxnQgAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: The classic chronicle of a communion with nature at Walden Pond offers a message of living simply and in harmony with nature, and Thoreau champions the belief that people of conscience are at liberty to follow their own opinions..
